name.description: The human readable name of the module.

description.description: A short description of the module.

icon.description: The [Font Awesome](https://fontawesome.com/icons) icon name of the module.

tags.description: The tags associated with this module.

authors.description: The GitHub handle of the authors of the module.

defaultConfig.description:
Default user config.

The user-provided config will be deep merged with this config.

name.description: The human readable name of the script.

description.description: A short description of the script.

public.description:
If the script can be called from the public HTTP interface.

If enabled, ensure that authentication & rate limits are configured for
this endpoints. See the `user` and `rate_limit` modules.

storageAlias.description:
Used to keep actor IDs the same in case the actor name changes.

**IMPORTANT** Changing this will effectively unlink all data stored in
this actor. Changing it back to the old value will restore the data.

name.description: The human readable name of the error.

description.description: A short description of the error.
